# Config Template Reference

Generated `config.yaml` structure â€” substitute `{user_choice}` with wizard answers:

```yaml
# app-dev-suite Configuration
# Generated by setup wizard on {date}

documents:
  output_dir: "{user_choice}"
  naming_pattern: "{user_choice}"
  date_format: "YY_MM_DD"
  context_management:
    enable_summarization: {user_choice}
    summary_max_lines: 100
    enable_hierarchical: {user_choice}
  references_dir: "references"
  poc_dir: "poc"

feature_spec:
  path: ".claude/claudeRes/scripts/feature_spec.md"

task_naming:
  pattern: "{type}-{jira_id}-{brief_desc}"
  valid_types: {user_choice}
  jira:
    enabled: {user_choice}
    require_id: {user_choice}
    pattern: "{user_choice}"

agents:
  poc_expert: "poc-feasibility-expert"
  tdd_implementer: "tdd-implementer"
  web_researcher: "web-research-expert"
  document_summarizer: "document-summarizer"
  explore: "Explore"

quality:
  enable_metrics: {user_choice}
  enable_checklists: {user_choice}
  metrics: {user_choice}
  thresholds:
    feasibility_study:
      min_files_analyzed: {user_choice}
      min_solution_candidates: {user_choice}
    solution_design:
      min_subtask_count: {user_choice}
      max_subtask_count: {user_choice}
      min_test_cases: {user_choice}
    implementation:
      min_test_coverage: {user_choice}
      max_files_changed: {user_choice}

templates:
  subtask_design:
    include_overview: {user_choice}
    include_technical_approach: {user_choice}
    include_dependencies: {user_choice}
    include_test_strategy: {user_choice}
  scaling:
    enable_subtask_grouping: {user_choice}
    subtask_grouping_threshold: 20
    enable_batch_design: {user_choice}
```
